body_html: Thank you @windreamer. I also find this topic quite crucial for the "user experience" when we have distributed devices. Generally on cluster we could have really unbalanced GPU/CPU scalar resources ratio and there are different considerations to do for data parallel and model parallel approaches. So it is really interesting to have some feedbacks. /cc @mtamburrano @lenlen
